name: Manipur University
overview: A Central University serving as the primary node of higher education in the state. It affiliates nearly all general degree colleges in Manipur and offers a wide range of postgraduate and doctoral programs.

name: National Institute of Technology Manipur
overview: An Institute of National Importance established in 2010. It is the premier technical institution in the state, offering engineering degrees at undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral levels.

name: Regional Institute of Medical Sciences
overview: An autonomous institute under the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare, Govt. of India. It serves as a premier medical college and hospital for the entire North Eastern Region.

name: Central Agricultural University
overview: A Central University dedicated to agriculture and allied sciences, with its headquarters and College of Agriculture located in Imphal. It has jurisdiction across multiple NE states.

name: Indian Institute of Information Technology Manipur
overview: An Institute of National Importance established under PPP mode, focusing on IT and Computer Science education.

name: Dhanamanjuri University
overview: A state cluster university established by upgrading premier colleges: D.M. College of Science, D.M. College of Arts, D.M. College of Commerce, G.P. Women's College, and LMS Law College.

name: National Sports University
overview: The first central university in India dedicated to sports education, training, and research.

name: Jawaharlal Nehru Institute of Medical Sciences
overview: A state government medical college and hospital providing tertiary healthcare and medical education.

name: Manipur Technical University
overview: The first state technical university of Manipur, established to oversee technical education and offer B.Tech programs.

name: Manipur University of Culture
overview: A state university dedicated to promoting and preserving the rich cultural heritage, performing arts, and visual arts of Manipur.

name: Manipur Institute of Technology
overview: A constituent college of Manipur University, formerly known as Government College of Technology. It is a key engineering institute in the state.

name: Shija Academy of Health Sciences
overview: The first private medical college in Manipur, established by the Shija Hospitals group.

name: Don Bosco College, Maram
overview: A premier NAAC 'A' grade accredited college in the hill district of Senapati, affiliated to Manipur University. Known for discipline and academic excellence.

name: S. Kula Women's College
overview: A prominent women's college in Bishnupur district, offering arts, science, and commerce streams with NAAC 'A' grade accreditation.

name: Imphal College
overview: One of the oldest government colleges in the state, offering courses in science and arts.

name: Manipur College
overview: A co-educational government college located in Singjamei, affiliated to Manipur University.

name: Oriental College
overview: An autonomous government college offering undergraduate courses in arts and science.

name: Modern College
overview: A government college situated in Imphal East, providing higher education in arts and science.

name: Standard College
overview: A government college in Imphal East known for its arts and science programs.

name: Churachandpur College
overview: The oldest college in the Churachandpur district, serving a large tribal student population.

name: Rayburn College
overview: A prominent private Christian college in Churachandpur, offering arts, science, and commerce streams.

name: United College, Chandel
overview: The only higher education institution in the remote Chandel district, playing a vital role in tribal education.

name: Pettigrew College
overview: A government college located in the hill district of Ukhrul, named after the pioneer missionary William Pettigrew.

name: Lilong Haoreibi College
overview: A government college situated in a minority-concentrated area of Thoubal district.

name: Thoubal College
overview: A premier government college in Thoubal district offering undergraduate education.

name: Moirang College
overview: A government college located near the historical INA complex and Loktak Lake.

name: Bir Tikendrajit University
overview: A private university established by the Manipur State Legislature, offering various technical and non-technical courses.

name: Sangai International University
overview: A private university in Churachandpur district, offering diverse courses.

name: Manipur International University
overview: An autonomous state statutory international university.

name: Government Polytechnic Imphal
overview: The oldest polytechnic institute in the state, offering diploma courses in engineering.

courses.name: Diploma in Engineering (Civil, EE, ME, ECE)

name: National Institute of Electronics & Information Technology Imphal
overview: A premier institute for electronics and IT education, affiliated to Manipur University for BCA/MCA/M.Sc degrees.

name: C.I. College
overview: A government college in Bishnupur district offering arts and science education.

name: N.G. College
overview: A government college affiliated to Manipur University, situated in Lamphelpat.

name: National Institute of Technology Manipur
overview: NIRF Ranked Engineering Institute
